---
id: list-blocks
title: "List blocks"
description: "List all blocks account-wide or attached to a specific resource type. Blocks are sorted by `start_date` in ascending order (oldest first)."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List blocks"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/blocks"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



List all blocks account-wide or attached to a specific resource type. Blocks are sorted by `start_date` in ascending order (oldest first).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Page number","in":"query","name":"page","required":false,"schema":{"minimum":1,"type":"integer"}},{"description":"Number of items per request","example":"acct_1234567890","in":"header","name":"X-SavvyCal-Account","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Only return blocks with the specified attachment type.","in":"query","name":"attachment_type","required":false,"schema":{"enum":["provider","service","location","service_provider"],"type":"string"}},{"description":"Only return blocks for the provider specified by this provider ID.","in":"query","name":"provider","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Only return blocks for the service specified by this service
